00008 //Merc editing modes.  These are used to determine which buttons to show and hide.
00009 enum
00010 {
00011       MERC_NOMODE,                              //used for shutting down mercs tab, to extract any changed information
00012 
00013       MERC_GETITEMMODE,             //when selecting a specific piece of inventory from inventorymode
00014             
00015       MERC_TEAMMODE,                      //selecting a team with no merc selected.
00016       MERC_BASICMODE,                     //basic placement mode
00017 
00018       MERC_GENERALMODE,             //detailed placement mode for general information and NPC info
00019       MERC_ATTRIBUTEMODE,           //detailed placement mode for specifying attributes
00020       MERC_INVENTORYMODE,           //detailed placement mode for specifying inventory
00021       MERC_APPEARANCEMODE,    //detailed placement mode for specifying appearance
00022       MERC_PROFILEMODE,             //specifying a valid profile index will generate the merc automatically.
00023       MERC_SCHEDULEMODE,            //specifying a schedule for that particular individual
00024 };
00025 
00026 extern UINT8 gubCurrMercMode, gubPrevMercMode;
